subheader1.title: Backbone Boulder
subheader1.subitem1: POS solution for local Bouldering businesses with a focus on simplicity and ease of use.
subheader1.subitem3: Built with: Docker, C# (.Net 5), PostgreSQL and React

subheader2.title: Multiplayer Bingo
subheader2.subitem1: Bingo with multiplayer support that matches with nearby players.
subheader2.subitem3: Built with: Docker, Java, Android Studio, Firebase, Node
